item.description: Join Spark and I at Lucky Dogs Daycare in Milford, MA every Thursday at 7:30p for Drop-In Obedience Classes! Work everything from your basic sit, down, stay, come, heel to distance commands, attention work, proper greetings, fun tricks, Canine Good Citizen steps and targeting! You never know what you might get ;) ~~~ Requests taken on a weekly basis! ~~~ No prerequisite. Any age, breed, level welcome. ~~~ Call (508) 380-8853 with any questions. ~~~ No classes on holidays or "eves" of holidays. ~~~ Cost is $15, cash or check payable to Lucky Dogs Day Care, who have graciously donated the space. ~~~ No overly dog/human-aggressive dogs, and NO flexi/extendable leashes. ~~~ Bring high value treats (meat, cheese, hot dogs, etc.), a hungry dog and a confident attitude! Can't wait to see you there :)
item.name: Drop-In Obedience Classes during the week!
